Package game.environments

Class SpawnableGround

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.environments.SpawnableGround
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Graveyard, GustOfWind, PuddleOfWater
public abstract class SpawnableGround extends Ground
A special type of Ground representing a ground that can spawn an enemy. Created by: Vicky Huang
